content:
# My inventory is completely empty, which means I need to craft a burner mining drill before I can set it up to collect iron ore.
# 
# To craft a burner mining drill, I will need to gather some basic materials first. The recipe for a burner mining drill typically requires:
# - 3 Iron Plates
# - 1 Iron Gear Wheel
# - 1 Stone Furnace

# Since I have no materials, I will need to start by gathering some iron ore to smelt into iron plates and create the necessary components.

# I will attempt to harvest iron ore again, this time focusing on a different position within the bounding box of the iron ore patch.
# Let's try harvesting from the left-top corner of the bounding box.

harvest_resource(Position(x=-20.5, y=22.5), quantity=10)  # Attempting to harvest from the left-top corner of the bounding box.
